item.description:
Take Care of Yourself

Three-Hour Retreat for Active Caregivers
Thursday, May 12, 2011    9:30 am - 12:30 pm   $30

- A respite retreat program created for family care partners journeying with
a loved one through extended illness. Learn and experience seven
sustainable skills for the long-term-caregiving journey (including: intentional breathing, guided meditation, restorative postures, long-distance nutrition, sacred space creation, partner verbal and nonverbal connections, reflective journaling, therapeutic music and movement).

- Participants will receive and work with a “Seven Sustainable Skills” guided journal for personal practice at home or wherever life takes them.
- Mary E. MacDonald, M.A., founder of Marymac Missions, provides online and on-site programs that support life quality for people experiencing life transitions, illness and disability, grief and loss, recovery and renewal. Learn more about Marymac Missions at marymacmissions.com. Registration at: www.rest-stop-ranch.com or RSVP to this Meetup.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter door next to H&R Block and go up one flight
item.why: If you are in a caregiver role please join Mary MacDonald for a rest and learn practical guidance to help sustain yourself.
